about_the_game:
Race and battle your friends using weapons and karts themed after Vtubers and content creators! All characters in game can be found livestreaming on Twitch.



Race through different Vtuber themed levels like TomaKey's Liminal Spaces or Meat's Silly Safari. Avoid traps like the sewer water in Rum&Coq's Sewer Hideout or Princess the Sabertooth in Fang's Jungle Jam!

Use Vtuber themed items like TwirlinCurtis' Zaku Zapper to stun enemies you drive past or turn into a ghost like Icy to speed past other players and their weapons!

Currently Southside Racing supports up to 8 players in online racing mode.

New Karts, tracks, and weapons will be added in every game update.

Use Vtuber themed items like TwirlinCurtis' Zaku Zapper to stun enemies you drive past or turn into a ghost like Icy to speed past other players and their weapons!

Currently Southside Racing supports up to 8 players in online racing mode.

New Karts, tracks, and weapons will be added in every game update.
legal_notice: Southside Racing and all related IP/materials belonging to creation and function of game belong to Jiffy Goat. Copyright/Trademark of characters featured in game belong to SouthSide and their respective streaming talent.

short_description: Race and battle using weapons and karts themed after Vtubers and content creators! All characters in game can be found livestreaming on Twitch. Race through different Vtuber themed levels like TomaKey's Liminal Spaces or Meat's Silly Safari and slow each other down with weapons!
